constituent: vein, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, caveman, drag, person, rag
koohiiStory1: The vein is the part of the body most lusted after by the flesh hungry zombies (drag & rag - see revenantkioku frame 1855).
koohiiStory2: To get blood drawn from a vein you present the part of the body to the nurse, and they drag an alcohol swab (rag) across the vein.
